subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2016)
Television
lead_paragraph: NBC plans to be at the negotiating table to bid for rights to televise the 2014 and 2016 Olympics despite the United States Olympic Committee’s decision to build a competing Olympic network.
snippet: NBC plans to be at the negotiating table to bid for rights to televise the 2014 and 2016 Olympics despite the United States Olympic Committee’s decision to build a competing Olympic network.
